text: Thomas Colapietro (born 1940) is a former Democratic Connecticut State Senator who represented Bristol, Plainville, Plymouth, and part of Harwinton. He was born and lives in Bristol, Connecticut.Colapietro, Jr.'s Biography - The Voter's Self Defense System - Vote Smart Retrieved 2017-01-05.
